document.full_text: u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles into a house in pakistan's north waziristan region on friday, killing at least eight suspected militants, local intelligence officials said.
document.title: u.s. missile strike kills 8 suspected militants in pakistan
lines_and_colors: u.s. drone aircraft fired missiles into a house in pakistan's north waziristan region on friday, killing at least eight suspected militants, local intelligence officials said.
